ai-patthana8.45:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.45:1.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to the teaching,
ai-patthana8.45:2.1_0: or by hurting the teaching, it does not give rise to the cause or reason.
ai-patthana8.45:2.1_1: This is the section in brief.
